return authorizations lot/serial selection and
lots return authorizations and Return Authorization Item Lot/Serial
section.para: To authorize specific Lot/Serial quantities, select the NEW button. The following screen will appear:

mediaobject.caption: Create New Return Authorization Line Item

section.para: When authorizing specific Lot/Serial quantities, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Displays the Item Number specified for the Return Authorization Item. The Inventory Unit of Measure and Item description will automatically appear.
Enter the quantity of the specified Item you want to authorize.

note.para: The quantity authorized is based on the quantity Unit of Measure.

listitem.para: Displays the quantity received against the Return Authorization Line Item to date, if any.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without creating a new Return Authorization Line Item, returning you to the Return Authorization header.
Creates the new Return Authorization Line Item and adds it to the list of Return Authorization Line Items. If "Create Work Order" is specified, the associated Work Order will also be created.
